players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead on the first night. Let's be extra cautious and vigilant during our discussions and voting to ensure we don't lose any more valuable members of our town."

You: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events in our game. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. We need to work together as a team to ensure the safety and survival of all town members."

Bob: "I believe it's important for us to try and figure out what could have caused Diana's death. Let's share any suspicious behaviors or observations we may have had during the night, but let's also keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before making..."

Charlie: "I'm glad we're all taking this situation seriously and focusing on gathering more information before making any decisions. I didn't notice anything out of the ordinary during the night, but I trust that everyone will share any suspicions they may have had."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
